          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>

      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17252192">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17252192">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17252192">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17252192">
          <div id="boxatt17252192" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20319249">
              <a id="link_20319249" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20319249,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24940522">
              <a id="link_24940522" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24940522,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24940522}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Useful in particular for the reference lists that accompany many of the entries: popular and sometimes scholarly sources.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17252193">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17252193">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17252193">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Books (Secondary)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17252193">
          <div id="boxatt17252193" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20319251">
              <a id="link_20319251" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20319251,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20319395">
              <a id="link_20319395" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20319395,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a great way to preview book content.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17252194">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17252194">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17252194">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Journal Articles (Secondary)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17252194">
          <div id="boxatt17252194" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24940509">
              <a id="link_24940509" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24940509,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20319252">
              <a id="link_20319252" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20319252,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20319253">
              <a id="link_20319253" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20319253,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free search engine for books and journal articles in all disciplines.Links may take you to free full text, or search the library's site for full text access.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21444537">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21444537">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21444537">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Non-Scholarly (Popular) Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21444537">
          <div id="boxatt21444537" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24940516">
              <a id="link_24940516" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24940516,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12464689}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24942262">
              <a id="link_24942262" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24942262,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24940512">
              <a id="link_24940512" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24940512,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24940512}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The web can be rich source of popular (non-scholarly, non-peer-reviewed) resources in the form of blogs, news articles, and other digitized archival material such as letters, diaries, and government documents.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24940518">
              <a id="link_24940518" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/55428" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24940518,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24889044}); ">
               New York Times Archive 1857-1922 via Proquest
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24940519">
              <a id="link_24940519" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/45545" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24940519,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24889045}); ">
               New York Times Archive 1923-2012 via Proquest
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24940520">
              <a id="link_24940520" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24940520,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344565}); ">
               Reader's Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing of general-interest periodicals published in the United States for the period 1890-1982.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

       <div id="wrapbox21444596">

          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Documentaries
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21444596">
          <div id="boxatt21444596" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24940575">
              <a id="link_24940575" href="https://apply.ala.org/latinoamericans/resources/film" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24940575,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24940575}); ">
               Latino Americans Documentary
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               https://apply.ala.org/latinoamericans/resources/film
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4685020" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17252198">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17252198">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17252198">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17252198">
          <div id="boxatt17252198" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20319264">
              <a id="link_20319264" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20319264,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20319264}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20319265">
              <a id="link_20319265" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20319265,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Coming to America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20319265}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
